name: Web Server
description:
An easy to use Web Server you can use to develop static websites.

With a single line you'll be on your way!

For more advanced users the Web Server also supports:
- Multiple HTTP methods (GET, POST, HEAD, etc.)
- Server side scripting (Lua embedded in HTML source)
- Bi-directional WebSocket support.

When the 'Web Server' project is run and navigated to in a browser, the full documentation will be made available to you.
update_notes:
- Major rewrite
- WebSocket support
- Server-side scripting
- Improved API
